languages.text: {n}Заккари Вайс оборачивается к вам задолго до того, как вы подходите. По хребту пробегает холодок, словно кто-то наблюдает за вами изнутри.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Заккери Вайс оборачивается к вам задолго до того, как вы подходите.{/n} "Лорд-капитан. Я знаю зачем вы здесь".

languages.text: {n}Choirmaster Weisz turns toward you long before you reach him. A chill runs down your spine, as if someone were watching you from inside your own being.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Заккари Вайс оборачивается к вам задолго до того, как вы подходите. По хребту пробегает холодок, словно кто-то наблюдает за вами изнутри.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Choirmaster Weisz turns toward you long before you approach. A chill runs down your spine as if someone were watching you from inside your own being.{/n}
{n}Zacchary Weisz turns toward you long before you approach.{/n} "I know why you are here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And with all due respect, I am asking you to reconsider."
{n}Choirmaster Weisz turns toward you long before you reach him. A chill runs down your spine, as if someone were watching you from inside your own being.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El maestro del Coro Weisz se gira hacia ti mucho antes de que le alcances. Un escalofrío te recorre la espalda, como si alguien te estuviese observando desde el interior de tu propio ser.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Choirmaster Weisz turns toward you long before you reach him. A chill runs down your spine, as if someone were watching you from inside your own being.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El maestro del Coro Weisz se gira hacia ti mucho antes de que le alcances. Un escalofrío te recorre la espalda, como si alguien te estuviese observando desde el interior de tu propio ser.{/n}

languages.text: {n}クワイアーマスターのワイズは、あなたが近づくそのずっと前からこちらを向いていた。まるで自分の内側から誰かに見られているような、背筋が凍る思いがする。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Choirmaster Weisz turns toward you long before you reach him. A chill runs down your spine, as if someone were watching you from inside your own being.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}クワイアーマスターのワイズは、あなたが近づくそのずっと前からこちらを向いていた。まるで自分の内側から誰かに見られているような、背筋が凍る思いがする。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你还没来得及靠近唱诗大师威茨，他就转过了身。你感觉一股寒意顺着你的脊骨而下，仿佛有什么人从你的内部注视着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Choirmaster Weisz turns toward you long before you reach him. A chill runs down your spine, as if someone were watching you from inside your own being.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你还没来得及靠近唱诗大师威茨，他就转过了身。你感觉一股寒意顺着你的脊骨而下，仿佛有什么人从你的内部注视着你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Chormeister Weisz wendet sich dir bereits zu, ehe du ihn erreichst. Du erschauderst und hast das Gefühl, als würde dich jemand in dir selbst beobachten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Choirmaster Weisz turns toward you long before you reach him. A chill runs down your spine, as if someone were watching you from inside your own being.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Chormeister Weisz wendet sich dir bereits zu, ehe du ihn erreichst. Du erschauderst und hast das Gefühl, als würde dich jemand in dir selbst beobachten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le maître de chœur Weisz se tourne vers vous bien avant que vous ne soyez à portée de voix. Un frisson vous parcourt l'échine, comme si quelque présence impalpable vous observait de l'intérieur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Choirmaster Weisz turns toward you long before you reach him. A chill runs down your spine, as if someone were watching you from inside your own being.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maître de chœur Weisz se tourne vers vous bien avant que vous ne soyez à portée de voix. Un frisson vous parcourt l'échine, comme si quelque présence impalpable vous observait de l'intérieur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Koro Şefi Weisz, daha sen ona ulaşamadan yüzünü sana dönüyor. Kendi benliğinin içinden birisi seni izliyormuş misali tüylerin diken diken oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Choirmaster Weisz turns toward you long before you reach him. A chill runs down your spine, as if someone were watching you from inside your own being.{/n}
